title: Carnegie Principle Group 1
lesson_summary: This module covers Dale Carnegie principles grouped around theme 1.

quiz.question: Sample question 1 for module 1: What is the best way to apply principle 1?
quiz.explanation_correct: Correct! Showing genuine interest is a core Carnegie principle that builds connection.
quiz.explanation_wrong: Not quite. The correct approach is to be genuinely interested in people to build trust.
